ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Tattoos and Pigments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft basic pigments and tattoo designs from the pigment pit, these can be used to bolster abilities. Basic tattoos cover hands and feet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Tattoos
ResearchProjectDef.description: More tattoo designs that can be used to bolster abilities, advanced tattoos cover legs and arms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Complex Tattoos
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even more tattoos can be used to bolster abilities, complex tattoos cover someones back or chest.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pigment Mixing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create four more pigments and tattoo designs with new bonuses - basic, advanced, and complex.
